law.text:
To qualify for certification as a private detective, an employee of or applicant for employment with a licensed private detective agency shall:
meet the standards set by the Secretary;
submit to the Secretary:
a sworn application on the form the Secretary provides; and
the fingerprints required under § 13-304(c)(2)(i) of this title; and
pay to the Secretary:
an application fee of $15; and
the fees required under § 13-304(c)(2) of this title.
